document.full_text: the department of agriculture may issue a contract to a group co-founded by shirley sherrod, a black employee who resigned last year after an edited video falsely suggested she had discriminated against a white farmer.
document.title: u.s.d.a. may hire an ex-employee's group
lines_and_colors: the department of agriculture may issue a contract to a group co-founded by shirley sherrod, a black employee who resigned last year after an edited video falsely suggested she had discriminated against a white farmer.
